dc_title_s: Electric Power Substations: United States, Spring 2013
dc_description_s: This point shapefile provides the location, current and previous owners, maximum kilovolts of power, operational status, and other infomation for electric power substations in the United States. Data are updated to 2015. This layer is a part of a collection of GIS data containing renewable and electric energy information for the U.S., including data on transmission lines, power plants and electricity substations.This layer can be used for locating electric power substations within the United States.
